text: If any such company shall fail to file the annual statement herein required, the Commissioner of Insurance and Securities may thereupon revoke its license or certificate of authority to transact business in the District of Columbia.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2607.

1973 Ed., § 47-1805.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2601.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11- (Act 11-524), see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2603.

Miscellaneous Notes

Mayor authorized to issue rules: See notes to § 47-2601.

Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2603.

DC CODE § 47-2607

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Revocation of license for failure to file statement.
